PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>

DELETE
	{	?dataset dcat:distribution ?olddist .
		?olddist ?p ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?dataset dcat:distribution ?newdist .
		?newdist ?p ?o }
WHERE
	{ 	?dataset dcat:distribution ?olddist .
		?olddist ?p ?o
		BIND (IRI (
				REPLACE(STR(?olddist), '/dataset/', '/dist/')
			) as ?newdist)
	}
